author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Microsoft.PowerShell.Native](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell) from 6.1.0 to 6.2.0.
Release notes *Sourced from [Microsoft.PowerShell.Native's releases](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases).* > ## v6.2.0 Release of PowerShell Core > ## v6.2.0 - 2019-03-28 > > ### Breaking Changes > > - Fix `-NoEnumerate` behavior in `Write-Output` to be consistent with Windows PowerShell ([#9069](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9069)) (Thanks [@​vexx32](https://github.com/vexx32)!) > > ### Engine Updates and Fixes > > - Add PowerShell remoting enable/disable cmdlet warning messages ([#9203](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9203)) > - Fix for `FormatTable` remote deserialization regression ([#9116](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9116)) > - Update the task-based `async` APIs added to PowerShell to return a Task object directly ([#9079](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9079)) > - Add 5 `InvokeAsync` overloads and `StopAsync` to the `PowerShell` type ([#8056](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8056)) (Thanks [@​KirkMunro](https://github.com/KirkMunro)!) > > ### General Cmdlet Updates and Fixes > > - Enable `SecureString` cmdlets for non-Windows by storing the plain text ([#9199](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9199)) > - Add Obsolete message to `Send-MailMessage` ([#9178](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9178)) > - Fix `Restart-Computer` to work on `localhost` when WinRM is not present ([#9160](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9160)) > - Make `Start-Job` throw terminating error when PowerShell is being hosted ([#9128](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9128)) > - Update version for `PowerShell.Native` and hosting tests ([#8983](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8983)) > > ### Tools > > - Adding `CmdletsToExport` and `AliasesToExport` to test module manifests. ([#9108](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9108)) (Thanks [@​powercode](https://github.com/powercode)!) > - Comment cleanup in `releaseTools.psm1` ([#9064](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9064)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > > ### Tests > > - Fix `Enter-PSHostProcess` tests flakiness ([#9007](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9007)) > - Add tests for command globbing ([#9180](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9180)) > - Add source for `Install-package` to install `netDumbster` ([#9081](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9081)) (Thanks [@​Geweldig](https://github.com/Geweldig)!) > - Fix tab completion test to handle multiple matches ([#8891](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8891)) > - Refactor macOS and Linux CI so that tests run in parallel ([#9056](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9056), [#9209](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9209)) > - Added `RequireSudoOnUnix` tags to `PowerShellGet` tests and remove `-pending` parameter ([#8954](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8954)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Pending `NamedPipeConnectionInfo` test ([#9003](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9003)) (Thanks [@​iSazonov](https://github.com/iSazonov)!) > - Add test for `-WhatIf` for `New-FileCatalog` ([#8966](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8966)) (Thanks [@​mjanko5](https://github.com/mjanko5)!) > > ### Build and Packaging Improvements > > - Performance improvements for release build ([#9179](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9179)) > - Add `tsaVersion` property as `TsaV1` for compliance build phase ([#9176](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9176)) > - Publish global tool packages to `pwshtool` blob and bug fixes ([#9163](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9163)) > - Translate Skipped test results into something Azure DevOps does **not** understand ([#9124](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9124)) > - Disable Homebrew analytics in macOS VSTS builds ([#9130](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9130)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Remove AppVeyor references from packaging tools ([#9117](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9117)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Fixed Dockerfile syntax highlighting ([#8991](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8991)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Fix dependencies of NuGet build to wait on DEB uploads to finish ([#9118](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9118)) > - Fix artifact download issue in release build ([#9095](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9095)) > - Publish test package on release builds ([#9063](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9063)) > ... (truncated)
Changelog *Sourced from [Microsoft.PowerShell.Native's changelog](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md).* > ## v6.2.0 - 03/28/2019 > > ### Breaking Changes > > - Fix `-NoEnumerate` behavior in `Write-Output` to be consistent with Windows PowerShell ([#9069](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9069)) (Thanks [@​vexx32](https://github.com/vexx32)!) > > ### Engine Updates and Fixes > > - Add PowerShell remoting enable/disable cmdlet warning messages ([#9203](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9203)) > - Fix for `FormatTable` remote deserialization regression ([#9116](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9116)) > - Update the task-based `async` APIs added to PowerShell to return a Task object directly ([#9079](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9079)) > - Add 5 `InvokeAsync` overloads and `StopAsync` to the `PowerShell` type ([#8056](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8056)) (Thanks [@​KirkMunro](https://github.com/KirkMunro)!) > > ### General Cmdlet Updates and Fixes > > - Enable `SecureString` cmdlets for non-Windows by storing the plain text ([#9199](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9199)) > - Add Obsolete message to `Send-MailMessage` ([#9178](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9178)) > - Fix `Restart-Computer` to work on `localhost` when WinRM is not present ([#9160](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9160)) > - Make `Start-Job` throw terminating error when PowerShell is being hosted ([#9128](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9128)) > - Update version for `PowerShell.Native` and hosting tests ([#8983](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8983)) > > ### Tools > > - Adding `CmdletsToExport` and `AliasesToExport` to test module manifests. ([#9108](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9108)) (Thanks [@​powercode](https://github.com/powercode)!) > - Comment cleanup in `releaseTools.psm1` ([#9064](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9064)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > > ### Tests > > - Fix `Enter-PSHostProcess` tests flakiness ([#9007](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9007)) > - Add tests for command globbing ([#9180](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9180)) > - Add source for `Install-package` to install `netDumbster` ([#9081](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9081)) (Thanks [@​Geweldig](https://github.com/Geweldig)!) > - Fix tab completion test to handle multiple matches ([#8891](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8891)) > - Refactor macOS and Linux CI so that tests run in parallel ([#9056](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9056), [#9209](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9209)) > - Added `RequireSudoOnUnix` tags to `PowerShellGet` tests and remove `-pending` parameter ([#8954](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8954)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Pending `NamedPipeConnectionInfo` test ([#9003](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9003)) (Thanks [@​iSazonov](https://github.com/iSazonov)!) > - Add test for `-WhatIf` for `New-FileCatalog` ([#8966](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8966)) (Thanks [@​mjanko5](https://github.com/mjanko5)!) > > ### Build and Packaging Improvements > > - Performance improvements for release build ([#9179](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9179)) > - Add `tsaVersion` property as `TsaV1` for compliance build phase ([#9176](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9176)) > - Publish global tool packages to `pwshtool` blob and bug fixes ([#9163](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9163)) > - Translate Skipped test results into something Azure DevOps does **not** understand ([#9124](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9124)) > - Disable Homebrew analytics in macOS VSTS builds ([#9130](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9130)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Remove AppVeyor references from packaging tools ([#9117](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9117)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Fixed Dockerfile syntax highlighting ([#8991](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/8991)) (Thanks [@​RDIL](https://github.com/RDIL)!) > - Fix dependencies of NuGet build to wait on DEB uploads to finish ([#9118](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9118)) > - Fix artifact download issue in release build ([#9095](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9095)) > - Publish test package on release builds ([#9063](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9063)) > - Bump `Microsoft.PowerShell.Native` from `6.2.0-rc.1` to `6.2.0` ([#9200](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9200)) > ... (truncated)
Commits - [`370f5a7`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/370f5a7eb1a302e31cac6228181ffc184a32c47a) Merged PR 7747: Update the changelog with release date - [`513029a`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/513029a35627c2abb73445df29ade05c337abd02) Update release date - [`a79bda1`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/a79bda1116dcff463065751e7826aaca934361d5) Merged PR 7680: 6.2.0 Changelog - [`1fd69de`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/1fd69de8e9b47df0dd8192d89551b5c7abaa3159) Fix spelling - [`194bb39`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/194bb3915e2fab8d63367cf63750d65b6205bcfb) Address PR Feedback - [`e9a3899`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/e9a389951645cd568f6ae6462802a7d999d50ed3) draft changelog - [`fc87a3b`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/fc87a3b0a55d8ece554c10e24c4d3b3b65552f71) Add psremoting enable/disable cmdlet warning messages ([#9203](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9203)) - [`52ff03f`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/52ff03f392941d6d3e1d5211e95d7da667918432) Build(deps): Bump NJsonSchema from 9.13.26 to 9.13.27 ([#9196](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9196)) - [`566f4da`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/566f4da5b5a36bfe256ab8bd5c1473d96e914ba5) Make Linux CI parallel ([#9209](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9209)) - [`9e608ac`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/commit/9e608ac55fd2a803322ab0c19ef1ad5b4c63db45) Enable `SecureString` cmdlets for non-Windows ([#9199](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/9199)) - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/compare/v6.1.0...v6.2.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Microsoft.PowerShell.Native&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=6.1.0&new-version=6.2.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Microsoft.PowerShell.Native&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=6.1.0&new-version=6.2.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) --- **Note:** This repo was added to Dependabot recently, so you'll receive a maximum of 5 PRs for your first few update runs. Once an update run creates fewer than 5 PRs we'll remove that limit. You can always request more updates by clicking `Bump now` in your [Dependabot dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com).
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.author: dependabot-preview[bot]
comments.body:
OK, I won't notify you again about this release, but will get in touch when a new version is available.

If you change your mind, just re-open this PR and I'll resolve any conflicts on it.

title: Build(deps): Bump Microsoft.PowerShell.Native from 6.1.0 to 6.2.0
